name: Garfelf's Guide 1.4.3 port but I made it better
name_original: Garfelf's Guide 1.4.3 port but I made it better
description:
Original Mod By CubeMasterPro

Welcome to Garfelf's Guide To A Great Lasagna, A Mod For Baldi's Basics In Education And Learning By Micah McGonigal. In this game your playing the role of some random Joe, I don't know i don't write plots that make sense for these type of games. Anyways you are suppose to collect all three Lasagnas in Garfeilf and Jhon's house that is for some reason like a school. But be careful, because Garfelf and John are going to try and stop you from taking all of their Lasagnas. Do you have what it takes to take all seven of their Lasagna's and make it out alive, Download this brand new and exciting game to find out.

Also a little tip, when you collect all 7 Lasagnas, Turn down you volume or at least turn down you Headphone or just take them off or don't wear any because John gets a little pissed with you and so does Garfelf.
